import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import styles from "../scss/aboutme.module.scss" const AboutMe = props => { const [openAnimate, setOpenAnimate] = useState(false) const [openfromTab, setOpenfromTab] = useState(false) const [contentHeight, setContentHeight] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { if (props.location.state) { setTimeout(() => setOpenAnimate(true), 300) } else { setTimeout(() => setOpenfromTab(true), 0) } }, []) useEffect(() => { //nav 140px + 100 margin top //console.log(window.innerHeight - 240) setContentHeight(window.innerHeight - 140 - 18) }, contentHeight) return (
{openfromTab ? null : (
) } export default AboutMe
